n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt)
# coding: utf-8

N, K = map(int, input().split())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(N - K + 1):
    if h[i] < h[i + K - 1]:
        ans += h[i]
    else:
        ans += h[i + K - 1]
print(ans)
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


n = int(input())  # input
a = list(map(int, input().split()))  # input

a.sort(reverse=True)
ans = 0  # 出力

print(ans)
import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline


n = int(input())  # 入力
a = list(map(int, input().split()))  # 入力

a.sort(reverse=True)
ans = 0  # 出力
for i in range(n):
    ans += a[i] * (i + 1)


print(ans)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1


print(ans)

N = int(input())
h = list(map(int,input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt) 
# coding: utf-8

N = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

cnt = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] > cnt:
        cnt = h[i]
print(cnt)

n = int(input())
h = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    if h[i] > 0:
        ans += 1
        for j in range(i + 1, n):
            if h[j] > 0:
                h[j] -= 1

print(ans)
